mapper.insert: insert into board ( name, description, created_at) values ( #{boardName}, #{description}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.id as id, b.name as name, b.description as description, b.created_at as created_at, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM article a WHERE a.board_id = b.id) as total_item_count FROM board b

SELECT b.id as id, b.name as name, b.description as description, b.created_at as created_at, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) FROM article a, user u WHERE a.board_id = #{boardId} AND a.user_seq = u.user_seq
) as total_item_count FROM board b WHERE b.id=#{boardId}
